body:
`ginkgo --cover` no longer works in 1.7 as far as I can tell.

```
bash-4.3# ginkgo -r -trace -failFast -v --cover --randomizeAllSpecs --randomizeSuites -p -noColor
Failed to compile applications:

go tool: no such tool "cover"

Ginkgo ran 1 suite in 20.858570881s
Test Suite Failed
```
